attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MLFfBl-X4eL0wZiRqYZ_description
attribs.current: The hyena has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hyena's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MLfUIzkLSrrqlfK7oNz_description
attribs.current: If the hyena moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a bite attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the hyena can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MLFfF2Milgctw8g8Kn3_description
attribs.current: When the gnoll reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the gnoll can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MLeEX0eLP70iZi7ZcER_description
attribs.current: The gnoll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MLeEX0eLP70iZi7ZcES_description
attribs.current: The target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or take the poison damage.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MLeEX0gtwiLCRvQYx2D_description
attribs.current: When the gnoll reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the gnoll can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MLfXYvJhwtw57zACFYC_attack_tohitrange
attribs.current: +5, Reach 10 ft., up to four targets

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MLeEbVxkVqPrXDS87b-_description
attribs.current: The gnoll makes two attacks, either with its glaive or its longbow, and uses its Incite Rampage if it can.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MLeEbVyFlazYIfK7unb_description
attribs.current: One creature the gnoll can see within 30 feet of it can use its reaction to make a melee attack if it can hear the gnoll and has the Rampage trait.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MLeEbVyFlazYIfK7unc_description
attribs.current: When the gnoll reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the gnoll can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.
